Medford.Winn Farm: Winn Farm is a historic farmhouse at 57 Summer Street in Arlington, Massachusetts, USA. The 2-1/2 story wood frame house is estimated to have been built c. 1820, and is the only surviving farmhouse in northwestern Arlington from that period. It is a typical Federal style house, five bays wide, with a center entrance, standing in a part of the town that was not developed more fully until the 20th century.
